name: Letterpress Hedgehog Thank You -set of 5
description:
These bright and cheery folded thank you note cards would be perfect for your hedgehog loving friend or love one! These are blank inside. Perfect for gift giving or keep for yourself! Each card was printed by hand on a vintage platen letterpress.

Details for this item:
• Set of five notecards in a clear plastic box
• Folded note card and coordinating envelope
• Hand mixed inks
• Letterpress printed on recycled luxe card stock, pool envelope
• Size - 5 1/2"w x 4 1/4"h (A2 size)

*also available as a thank you note.

name: Letterpress Coaster Set - hedgehog
description:
These bright and cheerful coasters will make the perfect hostess gift for the next dinner party you are invited to! Or buy a set for yourself!

Cute hedgehog illustration, printed in red ink, wrapped up neatly in a tidy little box. Each box is topped with an extra coaster and tied with a red ribbon. Perfect for gift giving!

Details for this listing:
• Eight coasters
• Heavy weight coaster stock
• Size - 3 1/2" circle
• Hand printed on a vintage letterpress
